name: Priyanka
greetingText: I really like your name  Priyanka btw!
wishText: I  always be with you! when you in problem ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy  May your day be filled with joy, ...
text2: That's what I was going to do.

outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it and this small gift from Amit
replayText: Or click me, if you want to watch it again.
